org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.custom.controllers

Class XboxController.DirectionalPad

  • java.lang.Object
    • Button
      • org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.custom.controllers.XboxController.DirectionalPad
  • Enclosing class:
    XboxController

    public static class XboxController.DirectionalPad
extends Button
    This is a weird object which is essentially just 8 buttons.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XboxController.DirectionalPad.DPadButton
      This class is used to represent each of the 8 values a dPad has as a button.
